author: The Hill staff
title: Watch live: Gov. Andrew Cuomo updates New York state's coronavirus response
description: New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo (D) is providing an update on New York's state to the coronavirus pandemic.New York has been hard-hit by the virus, with 25,665 cases reported and 210 deaths,...
content:
New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo (D) is providing an update on New York's state to the coronavirus pandemic.
New York has been hard-hit by the virus, with 25,665 cases reported and 210 deaths, according to data compiled by CNN, with the vast majority in New York C… [+54 chars]
